title: Lima Accent Copper Black (20x20 PVC) Ceiling Tile
features: Can be painted with most any water or latex based paints
Tin like look from a modern material
description: These ceiling tiles are finished in antique design and are made of uniform Plastic. With this technology, it is possible to obtain smooth and even surface. They will give your ceiling an extremely attractive look. Additionally, the tiles have high water resistance and their smooth surface makes them easy to clean with ordinary cleansers. All of the tiles can be painted.
